name: market for ultrafiltration module | ultrafiltration module | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11679/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'ultrafiltration module', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;Thisis a mobile infrastructure, representing the product of a ultrafiltration membrane module and housing. The membrane represents a PALL UNA-620A module and is assumed to have 50 m2 of active surface per module. The process includes building materials but excludes production energy.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'ultrafiltration module',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  ultrafiltration module', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
